website_summaries.verdict: This well-made buffet table offers plenty of storage. A fine addition to any living space.
pros: Features adjustable shelves, storage drawers, and a spacious bottom shelf
We love how straightforward it is to assemble and that it comes with clear instructions
cons: A handful of buyers report misplaced guide holes for screws

customer_reviews.title: Great looking stand and the instructions were simple
customer_reviews.text: Great looking stand and the instructions were simple. Everything was marked clearly and screws all in separate marked bags. Be prepared to spend a lot of time putting it together though. Take your time, it's not that hard just a lot of steps... but it's well worth it. Evething fits great, doors are snug and higher quality parts than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Robbins

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but missing hardware
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking cabinet, that arrived well protected. It is a little smaller than it appears in the online pictures. It's only getting 3 stars because it did not come with all of the hardware needed. I had to purchase extra in order to assemble it.
customer_reviews.author: L O

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy parts
customer_reviews.text: This is not hard to put together but it’s a long, tedious process. I was very frustrated because towards the end after I put everything together I found out that some panels were checked and some holes were not aligned properly not allowing the Cam bolt lock to go in all the way. Also a metal piece securing glass panel broke off and the Cam bolt locks actually broke off. The parts are very flimsy and I feel like it’s overly price for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy but make sure it's what you want because returning it is expensive.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after a glass/bottle of wine and regretted it once the very large very heavy box showed up. They wanted $70 to return it and my husband refused to haul it anywhere. My 12yo daughter offered to put it together so I figured we would keep it. Turns out I LOVE it. We had it up for Christmas and I put lights in the windows. I filled it with the serving dishes I only use a few times a year that used to be scattered about. It's my favorite present. I assume assembly is easy since my 12 year old put it together but she might be some kind of IKEA Assembly genius...
customer_reviews.author: Dina Young

customer_reviews.title: Dropped from 10,000 feet
customer_reviews.text: Item looks very well made however apparently weight of item is just too much for shippers to handle. Arrived and looked like a piece of plane crash debris. Had a lot of dings and scratches. Weight of item makes returning not doable. Probably the last large item I will order on Amazon and I am a huge fan.
customer_reviews.author: William T.

customer_reviews.title: Poorly built
customer_reviews.text: We had high hopes for this stand but unfortunately it was too good to be true. The box wasn’t damaged from shipping so I can’t blame it on that. Some of the wood parts had pieces and metal parts pre-assembled. What happened was the metal locking screws were over tightened and it spilt the wood. Rather then throw the parts away the decided to ship them to us that way. It’s unfortunate because it’s on the front side where you constantly look at it.
customer_reviews.author: Matt M

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful piece to add to your space
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'2 and 120lbs I put this together by myself and it only took about an hour and half. The directions were easy to follow and loved how all the tools were laid out. Piece is perfect for what I was looking for. (Was a little bummed it wasn't as white as I wanted but totally works in my space the way it is). Super strong and looks great. Def have gotten a lot of compliments. I had one minor issue but its hidden on inside so no big deal
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: ... of these for my living room and they look great! They're surprisingly well made
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these for my living room and they look great! They're surprisingly well made, and easy to assemble. I was a little nervous ordering furniture from Amazon, but these are great. My only complaint is that you can reach/see straight through the design on the doors. My toddler is super into this feature...I knew they were like this before buying so it's not the vendor's fault, but it would be great if they had a mirror or glass backing on the doors. I may end up adding that myself at a later time.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: I love this cabinet!
customer_reviews.text: So easy to put together and looks amazing! It is fun that you can see through the doors and that you don’t have a bunch of little cutouts to clean glass through as it is just open. I did change out the handles to match my style a little more, but it has been great and looks good!
customer_reviews.author: Alize

customer_reviews.title: OK.  Wouldn't buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Hideous off-gassing smell last for weeks. I even baked it outside in the sun for close to a week. This cabinet had symmetrically hung doors (not an installation user error). There isnt any glass to the cabinet. The "X" design is wooden (or some composite) and exposed. It was purchased to store AV gear which would function better without a glass door.
customer_reviews.author: Sammy Jo

customer_reviews.title: Better quality than I expected.
customer_reviews.text: After reading the many reviews, I was a bit worried about the quality. But, this entertainment center turned out better than expected. I’m a 7 month pregnant SAHM and was able to assemble it all by myself. I thought I’d have to deal with some thin particle wood that cracks and flakes easily. None of that happened. Even though there is particle wood, it seems a good quality and looks really sturdy. No unwashable blemishes were on the pieces when I examined before assembling. The back panel is amazingly sturdy with screws instead of tiny nails so the back won’t get pushed out easily.
customer_reviews.author: Wes Larsen

customer_reviews.title: Defective but gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: Clearly they don’t inspect the product before packing it. Thankfully the defective piece isn’t a weight bearing piece and is not at all visible when finished. I wasn’t about to send back a 100 pound package. It took me 5 hours to assemble it by myself... however I did take a meal break. The instructions were really easy though I would give the finished product 5 stars if they would inspect the pieces before shipping. The end result is definitely 5 stars. So beautiful!! I am using it as a coffee bar and couldn’t be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Miss Understood

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, sturdy and just beautiful. No damaged parts. Date of manufactured was 04/17, received it today.
customer_reviews.author: An M Suei

customer_reviews.title: I was sold a used stand
customer_reviews.text: This has been a really bad experience so far. The package arrived without instructions so I looked up their website only to find out that the instructions they have listed for this model are actually for a completely different stand. As irritated as I was I decided to give it a shot and put it together. What I realized when I started looking at the parts is that this stand was used! You can see where the pieces have been attached and removed and damaged. I’m very very disappointed and don’t recommend.
customer_reviews.author: dcolon614

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Love the way this looks! Very well made, sturdy, looks more expensive than it is! Although I wi say it's a bit smaller than I thought it would be, so make sure to read the dimensions.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty adorable table
customer_reviews.text: I ordered it in the antique white and I absolutely love it and the detail. Putting it together does take some time and as long as you pay attention to the directions and not get too far ahead of yourself (I had to undo and couple screws and re screw them due to trying to rush) you’ll get it done in about an hour. It’s nice and heavy duty and I’ve gotten many compliments on it. Definitely would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and good looking cabinet with not so sturdy fasteners.
customer_reviews.text: We're using this as a TV cabinet. Assembly was fairly simple, however the instructions were not as good as they could have been. Assembly was nearly impossible without changing some of the things they wanted you to do. The cams supplied wer cast aluminum and too flimsy for the job, as several of them broke. The posts supplied that go into the cams head insufficient shoulders on them so they screwed in too far and had to be backed out for proper assembly. All in all it's a beautiful cabinet however I'm not sure how it will hold up over time being at the fasteners are totally inferior.
customer_reviews.author: THM

customer_reviews.title: Product arrived damaged inside a perfectly intact box - poor quality control
customer_reviews.text: The box was fine, and of the three damaged pieces, two were in the center of the box surrounded by undamaged parts, which would suggest that they were packaged damaged. This is very disappointing. I have requested replacement parts from the manufacturer, and will update this review once they arrive. Update: The manufacturer had no parts to send, despite have the ability to request them on their website. I ordered a replacement from Amazon, which was also damaged. Once I had three sets, collectively, there were enough undamaged parts to assemble one unit, and I returned the other two. This was a giant hassle with boxes of this size and weight. I'll buy furniture locally in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan D. Butterfield

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful color and easy to assemble. They did have a chemical smell for a few days which went away.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly C Squire

customer_reviews.title: Great Tv stand
customer_reviews.text: Fits our tv perfect.! I believe we have a 50” screen? We were able to place our surround sound speaker bar behind our tv as well as our PS4 and we were still able to place a couple other stuff behind the tv which is awesome. So it has plenty of space on top and in the cabinets. It took my husband 1.5-2hrs to put it together and that’s only because we have a 1yr old who kept wanting to help.! Lol (Sorry for bad lightening in the pics)
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Cute, stylish, simple
customer_reviews.text: I love this cabinet!! I bought it as decoration for a room I re-did in my home. The product was easy to assemble with everything clearly labeled. I put it together in just under two hours-- I did put it together myself, so another person may have made it go quicker. The only thing I needed another person for was setting it upright and moving it. The cabinet is so cute and ties the whole room together. It is modest and has plenty of storage in the shelving and drawers.
customer_reviews.author: kourtnie

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This piece of furniture is beautiful. It is very sturdy and awesome quality. It was easy to assemble when following directions. My husband had no issues and everything lined up. All parts are labeled. We did use wood glue to strengthen it, actually gorilla glue. I want to point out it was packaged very well too. There was layers of cardboard and foam between the boards. Ours came with zero damage. It is perfect for our 55 inch tv . It is a bit vintage looking which i love !!!! I am very satisfied and would definitely recommend. Amazon is amazing!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: I have put many "kits" together and this one is the best so far. All hardware was separated in individual bags and (numbered to correspond to the instructions). The instructions were clear and very accurate, large pictures with correct orientations of parts. Very well designed, with screw on heavy backing (usually these kit use small nails) I would give it more stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: NOT WHITE
customer_reviews.text: So many parts, but it went together fairly easily provided you follow the directions. Definitely need more than two hands for a couple parts. It’s a nice sturdy piece and will work well for what I need. I, however, expect white when I order white and this piece is NOT white. My only complaint, and a major one if the color is important to you. If I wanted antique white, or cream color I would have looked for and ordered that.
customer_reviews.author: Addicted2Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great looking piece of furniture. I bought it to match built-in bookcases and a built in desk in my study. I put on knobs that match and the color already matched. Looks like it belongs here! Great quality. Took about 2 1/2 hours to assemble, but not difficult. There is a center leg underneath the unit that snapped off with no resistance. Looks like it was applied with just a small amount of wood glue. But it certainly doesn't seem like that leg was needed anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Kirt

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for What We Needed
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to put together and turned out pretty sturdy. Ours did have a slight flaw from being in transit (probably UPS's fault), but it was in a spot you can't see and doesn't affect anything so it's great. I did fail to use the included glue because I didn't see where in the instructions to use it so I was holding on till it said to use it. It still turned out just fine, but when you go to assemble, glue away.
customer_reviews.author: MistyJay

customer_reviews.title: Stink
customer_reviews.text: Cannot get rid of the glue/formaldehyde type smell from the pieces after unpackaging them. I have aired them for two days, wiped them with vinegar/water, and put them outside in the sun for a day. The main culprit seems to be the pressed board pieces with cut-outs that serve as the back of the unit. Am refraining from assembly until and if the smell leaves as do not want to be breathing harmful fumes in a closed area. Very disconcerting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Richer Teal and Well Packaged.
customer_reviews.text: First, let me say this came very well packaged and protected to keep the parts from being damaged. It is a darker and richer teal than it is in the advertised picture which I was thrilled about. There is however a warning sticker inside that says not to put a tv on it but I don’t have kids and animals so I’m not worried about that. Also sticker is being a bit stubborn about coming off. It also says two people are recommended for ease for assembly but I was able to assemble on my own with a screw driver!
customer_reviews.author: mj

customer_reviews.title: Perfect TV stand
customer_reviews.text: I love this, it was intensive to put it together but the instructions were great and it went together well. I love it, it fits in with my living room quite well. I bought it to hold a new 55" TV and it is perfect. It holds a nice amount of old DVDs that I didn't want visible, and it hides the wires for my TV & Blu-Ray player.
customer_reviews.author: Adele P. Puccio

customer_reviews.title: Amazing attention to detail by engineers/designers
customer_reviews.text: There are a lot of moving parts, however, the engineers did a very good job organizing each individual part (even alphabetizing each screw component). The directions are very clear and easy to follow. With total focus on the project, it should be able to be competed within a few hours without any issues. The biggest worry I had was the glass doors and the drawers, but they literally took two minutes, because yet again, the engineers had good thought of all the details to make it easy on the end-user, and everything was organized (to the instructions) and to each and every part so very well.
customer_reviews.author: John J. Errigo, PhD

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and cute.
customer_reviews.text: I think this console is great. I knocked a star bc there is chipped paint. It seemed packaged well for shipping so I assume it’s just the quality of the paint. It was just two small spots (one 1 of 2) so I’m hoping those spots don’t spread! It took 2 ppl 2 hrs to put the first one together. I put my second one together alone and it took about 2.5. I’m not an experienced do-it-yourselfer. It’s not hard to assemble! Just read carefully and follow the directions. You want a power drill to screw the screws in or it would take so long. They seem sturdy and I’d recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Dawnice Murray

customer_reviews.title: This comes in many many pieces....and many scratches.
customer_reviews.text: I did not put this together, my husband did. Trust me, I received many dirty looks during the process. It took my husband close to 4 hours to put this together - literally gluing pieces together along the process. Don't get me wrong, I knew this when I purchased it - but just didn't believe it could be his bad. Halfway through we started noticing pieces that were scratched - what to do? Undo what you did the last hour and send it back??? In the end it is ours. I put a tablecloth on the top to cover the scratches and move on. I would not buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS CABINET!
customer_reviews.text: The only reason that I rated this 3-stars instead of 5 is that 8 of the dowel rods were missing when it arrived. I emailed the company and I am still waiting for them to respond. It is disappointing to say the least to open up a heavy box ready to assemble your new beautiful cabinet just to find that 8 tiny dowel rods are missing. Ugh. I ended up buying my own but I will tell you that dowels that measure within the metrics system are difficult to find in the US. Thank goodness for Dad! I would like a refund for my trouble!
customer_reviews.author: Gayle Borst

customer_reviews.title: Love, love,  love
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love love love this tv stand. I was skeptical on buying it since it wasn't real wood and I could only base the product off of the reviews and item images, but I am so glad I ordered this. It's beautiful and I have received a ton of complements on how nice it looks. As some other reviewers have said, this item does take quite a bit of time to put together. My husband probably spent a good 3 hours putting it together but it's so worth it. It cleans up nice and just looks beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie House

customer_reviews.title: Solid entertainment cabinet and excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: Was easier to set up than what I had read from other reviews and is solid cabinet. The doors needed some adjusting because they didn't fit perfectly flush, and I had to request the touch-up marker and a replacement door hinge due to one being defective. I received the replacement hinge within 3 days of contacting the company and they were very easy to work with. Unfortunately, they don't have the touch-up marker and the front of the cabinet arrived with a couple small blemishes on it. Overall, I'm very happy I purchased it and would buy from this manufacturer again.
customer_reviews.author: Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy build
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality. The packaging was fantastic. The materials were well protected and packed in a way to prevent damage. It was impressive. Assembly was not difficult but it was quite time consuming. I also had difficulty with not over tightening screws and such. (Which is opposite of my normal problem of not having enough grub to tighten stuff enough). I have also noticed it is easily scratched so take extra care to avoid that. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Davia

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful TV table and the price is perfect too!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this table. I looked at a lot of tables both on Amazon and Wayfair before picking this. Wayfair had the same table priced higher! This table is beautiful, well priced and very elegant looking in the space we put it in. It was very easy to assemble it, 2 of us did it in about 1.5 hrs. The instructions are clear and the parts are labelled very well. The box arrived in very good condition (was very heavy) i couldn't move it inside alone! The pieces were absolutely fine, no damage at all. I loved this table and have not one negative comment about it. I will post better pictures, but this is all i got now.
customer_reviews.author: ru

customer_reviews.title: The color is beautiful and assembly was easy.
customer_reviews.text: It’s beautiful but the left door is crooked. I installed it on the right side first and it scraped the bottom. I flipped it over and now it scrapes the top. The door, not the installation, is the problem. Will you send me a new door? Also, the price dropped considerably a week after my purchase. I hope you will refund me the difference. I was pleased with the instructions and assembly took my son and me exactly three hours to complete. It looks nice in our living room.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Cheap cam locks ruin a decent piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.text: Looks good once put together but the cam lock system on this unit sucks! Most use the posts that only allow them to go so far into the wood. This unit does not. If you screw them in all the way you will not have enough room for the lock to grab the post. Some you have to loosen so much they only have a couple threads holding it which allows the plastic insert to pull out of the wood. If they would upgrade the cam system I would give a better rating as the rest of the parts are adequate for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Brian C.

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: We had to return the first one as it was badly damaged even though the box was fine. The second came and was in much better shape. There was a corner on one of the shelves that was damaged before packing that was fixed by the manufacturer and a few other pieces were a bit wonky. It took about 3 hours to assemble but was more time consuming than complicated. I have it up and I’ll keep it but I wouldn’t recommend it... you just don’t know what condition it’s going to arrive in.
customer_reviews.author: N Jenkins-Haley

customer_reviews.title: Save your money!
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend this item. First, I paid over $300 then found the exact item for $173. The company, Cimax, would not cancel my order. They said if I did, they would charge me return shipping and a restocking fee which was over $100. Second, several of the camlocks broke, the top board was warped and the holes were full of sawdust I had to clean out. It took over 3 hour to put this tv stand together. Save your money, buy a better product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: difficult to assemble
customer_reviews.text: My husband is pretty handy and it took forever for him to assemble this piece. It came in a super flat box LOL. All in all, once assembled, it's a nice looking piece. It came with a small knick in it, which we didn't notice until it was put together. It's possible my husband did it while putting it together, so we won't return it. However, be warned that it's not likely a good piece for high traffic areas.
customer_reviews.author: EternalCrown

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!!!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived and was in some serious packaging to prevent damage. Product came with very clear instructions. Everything was clear and marked for even a newbie like myself. It took one and a half hours to put together. We purchased two! Love them so much! Sturdy, cute, low profile and looks great!
customer_reviews.author: GeekMom

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Clear instructions. You need a phillips but otherwise all parts were included. It's particle board, but it's nice and sturdy! All I had was a Gerber to put it together so I think it took me a little while. I suggest only putting the wooden dowls in half way, because the slots are pretty deep. All an all it was an easy build. Doors are slightly offset (right sinks in to the unit and left isn't flush). There was a factory chip in the finish, but a luttle woodglue secured placement (pictured). I'm satisfied with the product overall! Much better than what I had previously!
customer_reviews.author: K.Joice

customer_reviews.title: Good quality stand, solid and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: My husband says this unit has the best instructions he's ever seen, and he's seen so many assembly instructions. I like this unit for its appearance. It feels solid and all the angles are precise which is a bigger deal with furniture you have to put together. We did discover that it is not deep enough to house a CPU but all of our other components fit fine. The hardware is attractive and good quality too. Packaging was more than sufficient to protect the pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Pay For What You Get
customer_reviews.text: Pros: color is as pictured. Not terribly expensive. Once assembled it looks nice. Cons: has defects that are visible. Cams broke easily/repeatedly when tightened by hand carefully. When Cams were tightened, they broke through the other side. Cheaply made overall. If you're looking for perfection, this is NOT for you. If you want something that looks nice and clean, and you have kids..... I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: A. Schooley

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but a few issues
customer_reviews.text: A beautiful and sturdy piece of furniture. Assembly is much more involved than most. Had an issue with some of the screw-in cam bolts -had to be loosened out so they would catch and function properly. Also, the drawer guide pieces don't quite align with the drawer channels, so the function of the drawer is quite clunky. Besides those two issues, this is a decent piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Hansen

customer_reviews.title: beautiful!! like very expensive furniture!
customer_reviews.text: this was a little intimidating to assemble, but the instructions were easy and it came together so beautifully. it looks like a much more expensive piece of furniture and i have gotten many compliments on it. The entire thing is larger than i expected, which is a good thing - it is very sturdy and heavy - looks like something that was delivered from a furniture store. took less than 45 minutes to assemble and i love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Meredith Doubrava

customer_reviews.title: Easy Build, Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I am not a contractor, I don't repair cars, but I know how to follow instructions. Other reviews say it is hard to build and I do not feel the same. It did take me 3 hours since I was being overly careful due to reviews that stated having people taking days or most of one day to build it and that was not my case, This piece of furniture is great. It looks amazing and for the price you will be pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando Calderon

customer_reviews.title: For the price the quality is great. can be built with or without the legs ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price the quality is great. can be built with or without the legs (there is no glass in doors it is open). The back is color matched and seems to be more sturdy than the cardboard backs on some other build it your self items. (only issue I had was lining up the doors to match, there are several adjustments to get them right and it took a wile to line them up and not rub somewhere.)
customer_reviews.author: Michael william Jones

customer_reviews.title: Product components color did not match
customer_reviews.text: I noticed when inventorying the stand's various components one seemed a bit darker than the others. After I assembled the stand and placed it in the selected area in the room, the lighting showed that this particular component was shaded gray; like a primer color opposed to the stark white of the stand's features. It took Walker/Edison 2 weeks to respond to my email (they do not provide a phone number) and when they did it appeared they did not read my complaint. To dismantle the stand (especially if one uses the glue provided to assemble it) will probably cause considerable damage.
customer_reviews.author: Steve L.

customer_reviews.title: Horrible!!!
customer_reviews.text: A thousand pieces!! You must have lots of patience and be prepared to spend several weekends to assemble. I don't have this kind of time. Thought it was just a few pieces to assemble and it's not. So disappointed after reading the instructions. Still in the box and it's too late to return. I'm a teacher its been a stressful last 3months. Purchased this cabinet in May. I was looking forward to a relaxing summer putting this cabinet together and storing some dishes. Now Ive gotta find a handy person to put this together. So very upset!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rory L. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: I love this unit
customer_reviews.text: I love this unit!! However, when I put it together, a piece was damaged/cracked. I contacted the manufacturer to get a replacement part. However, it never arrived. So, it's sitting in my front entry missing a drawer front. I'll admit, it's not a major part, but it does look like something just isn't right when people see it. It's kind of like getting dressed, and only having one shoe. Yes, it's a functional scenario, but something is obviously missing.....
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Worth the assembly time
customer_reviews.text: First things first, I was not prepared for how long this took. It took me 5 hours, partly due to user error (tightened almost all of the cam bolts a little too tight so the cam locks wouldn't hook). Seems to be a sturdy piece of furniture, other than the cam locks seem to be cheap (1 broke on me). Thankfully there's a few extra pieces of hardware included. I didn't have any issues with hole alignment. Very nice looking piece of furniture even though it was a huge pain in the a** for me to assemble alone!
customer_reviews.author: ssica

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but..
customer_reviews.text: This is a very heavy, amazing quality set. The reason for 4 stars was because this was one of the worst peices of furniture I have ever put together. My fingers were blistered after about 5 hours of trying to fit the screws into tiny holes. Nothing would fit properly. 4 stars because I feel I got a defective product and Amazons amazing customer service solved the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Josiah B

customer_reviews.title: Just barely large enough to hold up an 82" Samsung.
customer_reviews.text: Needed something to get a big TV way up off the ground so I can see it over my computer desk when I'm working. This is about 6" wider than the minimum necessary for the purpose. The drawers are very convenient, and the whole thing took no more than about 90 minutes to put together. Easy to adjust hanging doors. One of my favorite pieces of furniture, very sturdy and well painted.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Mitchum

customer_reviews.title: Great Piece of Furniture
customer_reviews.text: Really a nice piece of furniture for the value. The packaging was well put together and protected the components nicely. Was a little worried based on the condition of the box but no issues. Although it does take some effort to assemble and requires the use of glue, it went together flawlessly with everything lining up. The glue was a nice change from the typical assembled furniture as it added a level of completeness and tightness not typically found. Very happy with the sturdiness and construction and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: RHBCT

customer_reviews.title: The wood panels break when fastened
customer_reviews.text: This manufacturers choice of mechanical fasteners and wood panel strength and quality results in a poor piece of furniture. Tightening the fasteners, even when using extreme care, caused the wood panels crack and break through panel surface. During my assembly, nearly every fastener created a bulge, crack or broke through the panel finish. The wood panels are not strong enough for this application. In addition, the instructions did not include enough written detail: the drawings were good but the "how to" was not there.
customer_reviews.author: Roger - Virginia

customer_reviews.title: Fingerprints show otherwise great
customer_reviews.text: This is a really beautiful piece but does take quite a bit of time to put together. You will occasionally need a second person to help. Heavy and sturdy but refrain from scuffing or scraping as much as possible. Leaves fingerprints easily which is really the biggest con.
customer_reviews.author: Allison&Emily

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: One of the cabinet pieces was broken on arrival. The cam-lock hardware was cheesy, four of the cams snapped. One part of the cabinet split while I was tightening the cam. The center support leg fell off during assembly - I discovered it was only glued to the cabinet. The supplied tube of glue was about half of the amount needed. The pack of cam bolts was short one piece. I finished the assembly with additional glue blocks and screws, because as supplied, I don't think it would have supported my TV. It looks OK, I guess this what to expect for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Sports Fan

customer_reviews.title: Very nice piece.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice piece...paint scratches easy so be careful assembling... Heavy and very solid...has ikea type assembly and tons of packing material..it's solid styrofoam and will chip and get messy. Took me about 15 mins to put together by myself ..would be faster with help.
customer_reviews.author: Jayprime

customer_reviews.title: Just what we wanted
customer_reviews.text: This tv stand arrived well packaged and in the timing we expected. It looks just like the listing - clean lines, sturdy and plenty of space for your entertainment equipment. It took my husband a few hours to put together but the instructions were clear and easy to follow. I would recommend and buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca L Vega

customer_reviews.title: It looks really great once assembled but as others have stated there are ...
customer_reviews.text: It looks really great once assembled but as others have stated there are a ton of pieces and it does take a couple hours or so to assemble, working by yourself (just me in this case). We had one issue, though, where the left side panel came without all of the pre-drilled holes...holes needed to attach the left door to the console. However, the website of the manufacturer was very clear on how to request replacement parts. We attached an image of what was incorrect and they overnighted us a new left side panel at no charge. So alls well that ends well. We like it.
customer_reviews.author: Matty Blue Eyes

customer_reviews.title: Great TV Stand
customer_reviews.text: I’m in love with this tv stand! We bought the grey one to match our living room, plus we needed a new one that had doors so that our toddler would stop getting into stuff. It fits our 55” tv perfectly and it’s slim but still practical. Shelves work great for storage. It’s exactly what we’ve been looking for!
customer_reviews.author: AleeshaBoo

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we wanted
customer_reviews.text: This TV stand with storage is exactly what we wanted in a TV stand. The detailed direction for assembly were concise and easy to follow. It is a perfect fit for our TV with an added bonus of additional storage space for the cable box and DVDs. We also like the fact that the cable box is inside the cabinet (it does not have to be on top of the cabinet) and it is still functional with the remote control. It is a nice addition to our living room.
customer_reviews.author: Boblintn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I love this cabinet! It's absolutely perfect for where I wanted it. It fit my electronic things perfectly: cable box, DVD player, wifi modem. Remote controls work great since there is no glass in the doors to block the signal. I did buy different knobs for it because the gold didn't match my decor. Other than that....I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Denise Moran

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!  Everything was perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Please do not listen to reviews! My husband, the handyman, took his time and actually read the directions! lol He said it was easy to put together! Everything is labeled and if you organize it before you start, you will have no problems. It is heavy and well made! I was really surprised! For the price, you are getting MORE! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than looks in picture
customer_reviews.text: This is the exact look I was going for. Super easy to assemble took one person 2 hours and would be faster with two. All pieces looked amazing until I got to the end and placed the top piece and there were scratches on the top, disappointed because I’m a perfectionist. Picture makes it look taller but it is not that tall. Overall good product and not cheap but can’t get over the scratch.
customer_reviews.author: Suge

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: When we got this, it was missing some screws & contacted the company. Instead of them sending them and waiting longer, we opted to just get them ourselves. I got this for a coffee bar and it was perfect for it! The top fits my Ninja coffee bar great and the cabinets underneath holds my coffee mugs! It was definitely a good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Brynn S.

customer_reviews.title: Could be easier, could be tougher
customer_reviews.text: This was not the easiest piece to put together, but when compared to some of the Sauder pieces we've had it was great. It looks so nice!!! It arrived two days late, and the box was pretty beat up but no damage to the pieces. Everything was in the box, nothing missing. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Surprised!
customer_reviews.text: This had mediocre ratings but I took a chance. Package arrived fast and was in tact. Unpacked and laid everything in floor and found all parts included and labeled accurately. Used high quality wood glue and was finished in 1.5 hours. Very sturdy and not a blemish on it. Exactly what I wanted. Kudos to manufacturer and Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Steven Branstetter

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money. Very poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: I would rate this 0 if I could. It is very poor quality. The finished product looks very cheap and the white is not white. It looks more like cream. I would return it if I could. I am actually even embarrased to leave it in my home. Thinking of putting it in the garage somewhere for storage. Don't think it will last. Please don't waste your money. You can buy an actual real wood product for almost the same price. I made a huge mistake in purchasing this. Don't make the same mistake.
customer_reviews.author: Zali

customer_reviews.title: Love the console table
customer_reviews.text: Love the console table. Only one drawback... two of the pieces were stuck together and had to be pulled apart and left one of the panels with "stuck like glue marks" I didn't send it back because I just didn't feel like waiting and then having to put it together again... on a great note, I do love the cabinet and it goes great in the space i placed it in!
customer_reviews.author: Sonjask

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy with lots of storage
customer_reviews.text: Thought it might be too complicated and heavy for me to handle so had the Amazon professional put it together. He did the job in no time. Love the TV Stand. It has plenty of room for TV and storage underneath. Fits in my room nicely.
customer_reviews.author: JS Smith

customer_reviews.title: No response from Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I love this piece of furniture; however, I received it 1 month ago & immediately requested customer support for scratches that were on the very front of the cabinet. The request had to be made online & I never received any type of confirmation. This made me very wary of purchasing furniture from Amazon again. My next two major purchases were from area retail shops. If this could be resolved, I would give the furniture a higher rating.
customer_reviews.author: rod

customer_reviews.title: beautful table, nice design made impossible to assemble by careless factory worker
customer_reviews.text: We unpacked the very heavy box, checked to be sure all parts were there and waited for the expert assembler. About 40 minutes in, he notified me that we had a problem. Some of the holes for cam bolts in the end panels were drilled WAY too big. We have requested a replacement. Hopefully we will have better luck this time. What a shame.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not over tighten
customer_reviews.text: The directions were fabulous but there were about 15 different kinds of hardware so you have to be organized and follow the directions exactly as they are laid out. There was a few extra hardware pieces which are always helpful. It took about 2 hours with two people to assemble. A screw gun is helpful. Tip... Do not over tighten.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Griffin

customer_reviews.title: I am in love!
customer_reviews.text: I Love this! The shade of red is exactly what I was looking for in this style and it looks slightly rubbed or antiqued. It was easy to put together - 1 person about an hour. It seems sturdy and the drawers and cabinet doors fit perfectly. There are holes in the back for cords. I'm looking now at all the W.E. furniture for other areas in my home.
customer_reviews.author: Tracie R.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: It took me a long time to find the right piece for my dining room. This is a beautiful cabinet. It was fairly straight forward when building it. Instructions were clear. However, I could not get the drawers to align. I spent over an hour trying to get them to work. Finally I had someone else fix them. Love the color, love the look. Wish it was a little longer.
customer_reviews.author: Dreamkeeper

customer_reviews.title: Would Recommend
customer_reviews.text: This piece is exactly what we were looking for and its sturdy once put together, it took about two hours to put together however when we were finished we realized there was glue we could have used that wasnt listed in the instructions, other than that assembly wasnt hard. Mine did come with a piece that was loose but we made it work because sending it back and waiting for a new one would have been a hassle
customer_reviews.author: Crysta

customer_reviews.title: Huge scratches
customer_reviews.text: Took 8 hours to put together! Last piece on was the on it! I don’t know what to do now ! I’m not taking it apart to send back and I most definitely don’t want to build another one. But I can’t use it because it looks horrible. Yes I know I should have checked all the pieces before , but I didn’t. I can’t reach anyone. Manufacturer site says to pay for new piece, huh No. Besides the huge scratches I would have love it 😞
customer_reviews.author: Diane Gutleber

customer_reviews.title: Save yourself the stress of putting together furniture with poorly fitting pieces.
customer_reviews.text: Although I managed to get this thing together, and it is beautiful, if I knew what I know now, I would not have ordered it. Nothing prepares you for the fact that you have to NOT screw parts C and D in all the way in in order for the parts to fit together. And the screws labeled S do not fit and cannot be screwed in. Oh and they provide glue, but it’s no where in the directions. I think maybe they know there will be issues.
customer_reviews.author: Charity Bowie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Sturdy and Great Instructions
customer_reviews.text: This was the best piece of furniture I've ever had to put together. The instructions were great and easy. And the finished product was beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: I’m in love with this table!
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this table. Instruction to assemble is easy to understand. It has a lot of parts but everything was complete and some packets have even more than what it should be. It took me about 2-3 hrs to assemble bit it was fun doing it. Delivery was fast. There were different options for sellers and im glad i picked the right one. Disnt have any single issue. The size is perfect for my dining room, not big nor small. The price is very cheap for the quality you’re getting.
customer_reviews.author: PpDd

customer_reviews.title: Solid, Well-built Entertainment Center
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't be happier! It arrived well packaged with no problems. The install took some time but for such a nice looking piece of furniture it was definitely worth it. A few things to keep in mind: -It will take you an hour or two, at least, to put everything together. -If you're weak like me you'll need help moving the box up stairs. It arrives at well over 100 lbs. -Lastly, I HIGHLY recommend getting someone to help you. There are several steps that I was thankful to have someone holding pieces together whereas if I were building this on my own it would be significantly more frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: TheJerkStore

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong - great price and quality
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this piece of furniture. Extremely easy to put together and looks wonderful. Everything lines up perfectly, not door misalignment or anything. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Bonzilass

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, so-so build quality
customer_reviews.text: Overall a nice piece of furniture for the price. I took one star off because the build quality in some places was a little shoddy. For example, on the side pieces as well as the top, the bolts can screw down too far into the holes, which resulted in them not sticking out far enough for the cam locks to grab a hold to secure the pieces together. I had to unscrew them a bit, which leaves me a little nervous about moving it. Other than that, It looks nice and fits the space well.
customer_reviews.author: James Warne

customer_reviews.title: Very beautiful piece, but a couple drawbacks.
customer_reviews.text: We had to send the first one back, which was a pain because we had it part-way put together. It was missing pieces. It took about 2 weeks, I believe, to get the replacement. Once we got the replacement my husband put it together (which took a little while) and it looks great. It's the perfect piece for our living area. It fits our 50" TV easily, with plenty of room on either side. I don't see why it wouldn't hold a 60". It's very sturdy and classy -looking. Con: I couldn't fit my DVD player or my Dish TV box inside. I had to place them on the bottom shelf.
customer_reviews.author: American Mom

customer_reviews.title: Be careful to not over screw
customer_reviews.text: After assembling it, (one person works fine) I love the final outcome. Nothing was damaged which was good to see. I made the mistake of tightening the long silver screws too much so then I had to go back to each one and unscrew it some. After fixing that, everything looked great. The doors seemed off and wouldn't close well until I realized that I could unscrew a small screw on the hinge to adjust and now they fit like a glove. This item was very heavy however, luckily I had someone to bring it upstairs for me.
customer_reviews.author: mairead roberts

customer_reviews.title: Perfect under my 55" wall-hung TV
customer_reviews.text: I needed something for an awkward setup in a room with a fireplace and wall-to-wall built-in shelving. This is perfect, being tall and low-profile. It significantly improves our space by organizing 4 video game consoles, a Blu-ray player, and a 7-way audio/receiver system, while stashing all the cables out of sight. I ordered the walnut thinking it was the closest thing to the finish of the built-in woodwork, but it is darker and redder than I expected. Nevertheless, it looks nice in the room and cleans up the space!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this little cabinet. It’s the perfect size - smaller than what I thought it would be based on the photos. I do wish it has glass because my cat likes to paw things out of it, but it’s really nice and I don’t regret my purchase at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Make time to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Omg! Still love this! Took my husband a while to assemble but came out great. Perfect furniture filler.
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: While I usually steer clear of 'put it together yourself furniture' I loved the look and style of this piece. First, this stand is HEAVY. This is not cheap partice board. It put together easily with nothing but a Phillips screwdriver. This is a very nice solid piece of furniture. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: HARK

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking  once it is assembled but boy, the assembly!
customer_reviews.text: Came with a 36 page assembly instructions manual and my handyman (who is a semi retired general contractor) said there were so many pieces, it was like assembling a puzzle. He did like fact that hardware parts were in separate small bags, not lumped together. If you're interested in this piece you might want to wait, price has kept dropping last week or so.
customer_reviews.author: walterco-sd

customer_reviews.title: very nice...easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: parts are clearly numbered follow the pictures and it goes together no problem...seems very sturdy box was in ruff shape upon delivery but all pieces were in perfect shape....nice off white cream color
customer_reviews.author: Susan Van Horn

customer_reviews.title: Real nice ,good looking!
customer_reviews.text: I love it good price, had to be completely assembled. Glad my husband did it, came in all kind of pieces. Compared to All other place shipping was a lot,Amazon prime Free 🙏😜! Thank you and came fast!
customer_reviews.author: cherri cherri

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I am loving my white cabinet. Very worth the purchase for me, however, it does have an unusual feel to it. I don't move things on the surface without picking them up and am careful to replace it. I feel if you slide the item on top of it, it would "scratch". I have one "scratch" which actually is a blackish discoloration more than a scratch.
customer_reviews.author: K Toney

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: I was really impressed with not only the quality of the item, but also how well the item was protected by the packaging. Well built and good instructions for assembly.
customer_reviews.author: J. Gray

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful piece..and great price for the quality of the cabinet!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful product! Love!! Assembled it myself, it wasn’t a bad experience except for the fact that the measurement on the left of the cabinet was just a tad off. That made a little bit of a challenge where I had to force the piece together in order for it to stay in place. Other than that.. not bad. It’s better for 2people to assemble though...
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great piece of furniture!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this tv stand. It is taller than most which I like. I was a little skeptical when ordering and especially when it arrived in a box about 10 inches wide but it turned out to be a quality piece. It took about 3 hours to put together by myself but with help it would be much easier. The instructions were very clear with good pictures and when finished it is very sturdy. I am very happy with the purchase and would buy from this manufacturer again.
customer_reviews.author: SWilson

product_meta.title: Walker Edison Furniture Company Rustic Farmhouse Wood Buffet Storage Cabinet Living Room, 52 Inch, White
product_meta.description: The added height and style of this console make it a perfect fit for any room in your house, whether it be for entertaining, dining, or decorative purposes. Crafted from high-grade MDF, this entertainment center accommodates most TVs up to 55 inches. Features adjustable shelves behind glass-paned doors to provide ample storage space for media components or decorative accessories. Includes two multi-functional storage drawers and a spacious bottom shelf. In a transitional style, this TV stand gives a stylish update to your living room, entryway, or kitchen.
feature_bullets: Dimensions: 35" H x 52" L x 16" W
Cable management features to run cords in the back of the TV stand
Made from high-grade MDF and tempered glass
For TV's up to 56". Supports up to 250 lbs.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars180 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
